page.title: 05Farming
page.content: There are many farms in the area most of them fairly small employing very few people and with a wide mixture of produce. All grow grass for grazing and winter feed and Ivy House farm is the largest producer of grass seed in Warwickshire Most farms have animals of some description.The 60 acres of Springfield farm is used solely for grazing for 18 milk producing{cows while the buildings are used for intensive{pig}breeding. Of Windmill farm's 350 acres,270 are used for growing{cereals}and 80 for beef and dairy cattle. Manor farm is principally a{dairy farm producing milk from Fresian cattle and breeding young animals.A small proportion of the land is used for cereals.
